author: RTÉ News
title: UK 'reaching' virus peak, claims chief medical officer
description: England's chief medical officer believes the UK coronavirus death toll, which now stands at almost 13,000, is approaching its peak but warned of grim figures to follow in the next 24 hours.
content:
England's chief medical officer believes the UK coronavirus death toll, which now stands at almost 13,000, is approaching its peak but warned of grim figures to follow in the next 24 hours.
"On the issue of the peak, our view is that it is probably reaching … [+2171 chars]
